title: Bands
dimensions: Length: 76 cm [30"] Lace edge top and bottom. Width: 49 cm [19.25"] Lace edge on both sides.
creditline: Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, Mrs. Griffith Bailey Coale, Mary Hearn Greims, and Anonymous Donors
description: Four linen embroidered bands, joined one on top of the other, with bobbin lace and encircled with bobbin lace. The embroidery depicts unicorns at a fountain surrounded by insects and animals that are worked in raised stitches.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bands.
Medium: linen
Technique: embroidered. Museum purchase from Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program and through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, Mrs. Griffith Bailey Coale, Mary Hearn Greims, and Anonymous Donors. 1995-102-1.
